events.name: Dream Brewery Hackathon
events.description: The love for beer and its craft has been around for ages but nothing has changed much since. Here’s a crazy idea for you. What would happen if we apply technology to this classic drink? Come hack 3 challenges with ABInBev at the Dream Brewery Hackathon on November 7th & 8th and stand a chance to win cash prizes, cool toys & even mentorship support to revolutionise the F&B space!  Use “Free4iOSDev” @ http://Bitly.com/dreambreweryhackathon­ to get FREE tickets to the hack!  PRIZES • The first place team will receive S$2,000 and Apple iWatches  Second Place Team: S$1,000 + Cherokey 4wd Robot Kits • Third Place Team: S$500 + Insectbot Kits • Immediate Qualification: The top 3 winning teams directly qualify for the Budweiser Dream Brewery Pitch Day on February 18, 2016 (pitch your tech and your team could win: S$25,000 funding, incubation & partnership opportunities)  JUDGES  • APAC CIO, ABInBev • APAC Innovation Manager, ABInBev • Tyson Hackwood, Head of Asia, Braintree • Bradley Priest, CTO/Cofounder, TradeGecko • Michael Lints, Venture Partner, Golden Gate Ventures • As well as other top CTOs and VCs

events.name: Online Safety
events.description:
Participants, guided by Symantec Singapore staff facilitators, work their way through 4 activity stations  before proceeding through the iZ Hero Exhibition. These activities are suitable for primary school children. This initiative is part of Symantec SIngapore's corporate social responsibility programme

AM session : 10am to 12:30pm
PM session : 2:30pm to 5pm

Limited to 40 participants per session (first come first served basis)
Workshop is Free, Science Centre Admission applies to non members
